name: Tesfraction
description:
A first-person horror game set in an abstract world from which to escape. The main feature here are NO screamers, the game scares through the atmosphere, sounds and music.

______________________________________________________________

Synopsis

You are an ordinary guy who ended up to be in the wrong place at the wrong time. And now you are in a certain dimension, from which you need to get out avoiding enemies and various anomalies.

______________________________________________________________

Features
  • NO screamers
  • Atmospheric world
  • Unusual setting

______________________________________________________________

How long does Tesfraction take to complete?

On average 15-20 minutes

___________________________________

How many languages are available?

English and Russian

___________________________________

How to change the language?

The language is selected automatically depending on the language of your system

___________________________________

What platforms is the game available on?

Windows

______________________________________________________________

Specs

Minimum:

  • OS: 64bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) 
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

______________________________________________________________

Known Issues
  • Minor bugs with lighting can be encountered during the game
  • Freezes during checkpoints
  • Some textures may flicker at the lowest graphics settings

______________________________________________________________

Note from Dev

This is my first game, I hope you enjoy it :)

______________________________________________________________

Install Instructions
  • Download the 7z archive.
  • Extract "Tesfraction" folder anywhere you like.
  • Browse inside to find and execute "Tesfraction.exe"
